units.name: Shade
units.prompt: Cloak immediately on turn 1. Move toward the enemy medic or weakest target. Use shadow_strike when adjacent while cloaked. Use breach to sabotage high-value targets.

units.name: Longshot
units.prompt: Maintain distance. Use precision_shot on high-value targets — medics first, then damage dealers. Use suppressing_fire if enemies close in.

units.name: Rampart
units.prompt: Hold the front line. Position between allies and enemies. Use shield_wall toward incoming threats. Attack adjacent enemies.

player.placementPrompt: Cluster near the center for mutual support. Front-liner forward, others one row back.

units.name: Insight
units.prompt: Use scan to reveal enemy prompts and cloaked units. Stay at max range (≤4 tiles for scan). Use recalibrate on wounded allies to buff them. Keep distance from enemies and avoid adjacent vectors.

units.name: Aegis
units.prompt: Push forward aggressively. Shield_wall facing the enemy cluster. If flanked, turn to face the biggest threat. Attack when possible.

units.name: Viper
units.prompt: Control chokepoints with traps. Place them between enemy positions and your allies. Use denial to block adjacent enemy abilities. Pulse groups when possible.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place aggressive units forward on one flank. Support units behind and toward center.
